PluginManager Class Reference

PluginManager class manages plugin loading. PluginManager is used to load plugins, manage the list of loaded plugins. More...

Detailed Description

PluginManager class manages plugin loading. PluginManager is used to load plugins, manage the list of loaded plugins.
